category-def.name: Utilities and 3rd party libraries
category-def.label: Utilities and 3rd party libraries
category-def.description: Utilities and 3rd party libraries for PNML Framework.

category-def.name: Petri net types
category-def.label: Petri net types
category-def.description: Libraries to import/export Petri Net models in PNML (ISO/IEC 15909-2). Compliance with Petri Net Types defined by the PNML Standard: P/T Nets, Symmetric Nets, High-Level Petri Nets, and P/T Nets in High-level notation.

category-def.name: PNML Framework SDK
category-def.label: PNML Framework SDK
category-def.description: The complete PNML Framework SDK (all the libraries, sources included).

category-def.name: Optional Tools
category-def.label: Optional Tools
category-def.description: Some helpers, in particular to handle NUPN tool specific info (Caesar.bdd)
